ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then I called them loudly and more openly,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I preached to them aloud, in public.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then verily, I called to them openly (aloud).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then surely I called to them aloud:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then indeed I called them openly;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! I have called unto them aloud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then verily have called Unto them publicly:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So I have called to them aloud;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then verily, I called to them openly (aloud);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [71:8] Then indeed I summoned them aloud, that is to say, at the top of my voice;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! I have called unto them) to repent and believe in Allah's divine Oneness (aloud) openly, thus avoiding secrecy,
